title: GJ Bu - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Clubs   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Araki Shin   新木伸
description:
Shinomiya Kyōya is forced to become a new member of the GJ-bu (lit. GJ Club), an unidentified club that dwells in a room of the former building of a certain school.

There he meets four girls: Mao, Megumi, Shion and Kirara. Time flies with these unique girls around. The series follows the everyday, though unusual, antics of this band of friends.>
